name: Bunte Bläschen: Kekris Edition
description:
Bunte Bläschen: Kekris Edition is a mix between a bubble shooter and tetris.

Unlike Tetris, every individual block inside the larger Blocks has it's own random colour. Everytime 3 blocks or more of the same colour are matched they get destroyed. Blocks in air will be moved down. 

Upcoming:

  • A public Leaderboard
  • Style options - add a custom background or add images to the blocks
  • Different difficulties.
  • A second gamemode.
  • A standard Tetris gamemode.
  • A scene with credits
